title: Trimming, 1943-46-66, early 19th century
medium: White, black, and colored silk in velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two shields, each under a crown, showing two black animals surrounded by a blue border with stars, and the other a red cross on gold X on a blue ground surrounded by a red border.  Galloon has a white ground with borders of diagonal blocks alternating red and yellow.
